Uramichi Oniisan

7.2

2021

Anime

The popular kids show "Together With Mom" has kids be attended to by happy, optimistic hosts with a ready smile and kind word for them. However, these hosts are still people with their own issues and struggles. Uramichi Omota is 31 years old, lives a lonely life with no wife or kids, has to deal with production hassles from unknowing or uncaring staff, and still has to give a good smile to the children every day.
